top.subheading: One Click Solutions for your Kintone setup.
top.subheading2: Set it and forget it -- your oraganization's pain points solved with smart, one-off solutions developed by a Kintone professional. Plugins and Apps to just help get work done.
top.consultHeading: Custom Solutions for your Business Needs
top.consultText: In addition to our pre-made drop in solutions, we consult and develop custom made integrations for your organization. Developed by a Kintone professional, myself, who values ownership of ideas, smart solutions, and no-frills no 'gotcha' products.

tooltip.ep: Useful for organizations with large numbers of users and apps, who need to make internal processes smoother
tooltip.smb: Great for letting a few Kintone users multiply their output.
tooltip.dev: Helps every developer become a 10x engineer.

1.title: Simple product that's easy to start with
1.text: Elegant UX, usable by anyone in your organization effortlessly, and easily.

2.title: Comprehensive support
2.text: Thorough, free consultation support before and after starting. We don't recommend solutions that aren't suitable for your company.

3.title: Improving common Kintone issues
3.text: As a long-time Kintone developer, I develop with users' common concerns in mind.

4.title: Pre-implementation security checks available
4.text: Kintone environments often handle personal information. We share exactly what data is transmitted and when.

5.title: Monthly payments ideal for small starts
5.text: Solutions usable from 500 yen, ideal for small starts. No cancellation fees or anything else like that.

about.name: Sean Luse
about.subtitle: Developer in Tokyo, working on Web Development, Game Development, and Kintone Customizations. Click on a project, read my dumb blog... the possibilities are endless!

hire.title: Talk to us
hire.subtext: Please feel free to contact us with any questions, or requests regarding our products. We provide security checks (what data is processed, sent where, and when by our products) for your organization upon request as well.

timeline.1_text: Studied abroad at Chiba University, ended up picking Japan for my future career path.
timeline.2: Return to Chiba on the JET Programme as an ALT.
timeline.2_text: Enjoyed teaching at elementary and junior high schools for three years.
timeline.3: Take position managing the JET Programme at CLAIR.
timeline.3_text: Worked with Japanese Ministries of General Affairs, Foreign Affairs, and Education, and co-workers from Local Governments all around Japan to run the JET Programme. Had my first professional programming experience managing the JET Programme wordpress site.
timeline.4: First Full-time developer position at REA
timeline.4_text: While originally hired as a mobile developer, worked with PHP, React, and NextJS with a small team of developers MUCH more experienced than I was.
timeline.5_text: Built Burayama as a junior developer with a team of 3 senior developers. Burayama promotes tourism and MaaS (movement as a service) for select areas in Yamaguchi Prefecture. Site is made for mobile devices only, so visit with a phone. (or use developer tools to shrink your viewport down to phone size.)
timeline.6: Take current position as Developer Advocate at Cyobozu.
timeline.6_text: Work promoting Kintone both in Japan and Abroad, by holding events, maintaining documentation, and building cool things using Kintone.
timeline.7: While continuing my work at Cybozu, found Seanco and code this platform to sell my personal Kintone related software.
timeline.7_text: Balancing work at Cybozu (which I love), a family, and my own personal development projects seperate from my work at Cybozu has been a challenge, but I'm excited to release software to improve people's user experience with Kintone.

kintone.title: Power up your organization with
kintone.introduction: Using Kintone development best practices to solve your organization's pain points with monthly subscription based Kintone plugins.

gamedev.title: Fast, Flashy, Fun. Engage users like never before with
gamedev.introduction: Here you can find my game development projects...

website.introduction: Here you can find my website projects...

payment_card_header: kGuide - Start using, or unsubscribe, at any time, no extra fees
kGuide_features1: Create onboarding tours with no-code drag and drop.
kGuide_features2: i18n support for English and Japanese
kGuide_features3: Support for all Kintone fields, dropdowns and menus
kGuide_features4: Permissions based guide creation. Limit guide creation to App Admins
kGuide_features5: No App limitation, no user limitations.
kGuide_features7: A security review before installation can be conducted. Please contact us via email.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.info_collection_text: We collect personal information only when users purchase software from us. The information we collect includes:
privacy.how_we_collect_text: We collect this information through a form on our website when you make a purchase.
privacy.use_of_info_text: The information we collect is used to:
use_of_info_items: Set up a Stripe Subscription for our product
Manage your account and provide customer support
privacy.info_storage_text: Your information is stored securely on:
privacy.info_sharing_text: We do not share your personal information with third parties, except as necessary to process payments and manage subscriptions through Stripe.
privacy.data_protection_text: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage.
privacy.cookies_tracking_text: We do not use cookies or similar tracking technologies on our website.
privacy.accessing_updating_text: You can access, update, or delete your personal information by:
accessing_updating_items: Using the Stripe customer portal to manage your information
privacy.childrens_privacy_text: Our services are not directed to children under 13, and we do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
privacy.changes_to_policy_text: We may update this privacy policy as needed to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons.
privacy.contact_us_text: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at:

services.title: Services
services.content: We sell plugins and apps. Some of our products, specifically Kintone-related software and plugins, require a Kintone environment to function.

account_security.title: Account and Security
account_security.content: For our plugins, you will receive a secretKey via email. It is your responsibility to keep this key confidential and not share it with others.

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: All software and products offered by us are proprietary and not open source. All intellectual property rights belong to us.

payment_terms.title: Payment Terms
payment_terms.content: All our products are offered on a monthly subscription basis.

cancellation.title: Cancellation Policy
cancellation.content: You may cancel your subscription at any time. Upon cancellation, you will retain access to the service until the end of your current billing period. We do not offer refunds for partial subscription periods.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate your access to our services if you use the software in a harmful way.

account_termination.title: Account Termination
account_termination.content: To terminate your account or subscription, you can either email admin@seanbase.com or use your Stripe customer portal.

privacy.title: Privacy
privacy.content: For information about how we collect, use, and share your information, please check our Privacy Policy.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. We will try to provide at least 30 days' notice of any significant changes.

subscriptionSuccess.title: Subscription Successful
subscriptionSuccess.confirmation: You will receive a confirmation email shortly.
subscriptionSuccess.noData: No subscription data available. Please contact support if you believe this is an error.

nextSteps.step1: An email will be sent to {email}
nextSteps.step2: The email will contain a download link for the kGuide Plugin in .zip format, and your secret key.
nextSteps.step3: In your Kintone environment, install the plugin on the Kintone Administration page.
nextSteps.step4: Then, install the plugin to as many Apps as you want.
nextSteps.step5: On the App's plugin settings page, click the cog wheel.
nextSteps.step6: Enter your secret key from the email into the subscription key field.
nextSteps.step7: Click on "Create Repository App" to create the repository for guides. This will create a new Kintone App, and only needs to be done once.
nextSteps.step8: Update your App settings, and create your first guide.
nextSteps.step9: Contact customer support at any time at admin@seanbase.com or via the Customer Support Button on the Plugin Configuration Settings Screen.

subscriptionSuccess.stripePortalInfo: You can manage your subscription, update your payment method, and view your billing history through our customer portal.
